Spells-Divine -- Male Half-Elf Cleric: 12
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 16 (+3) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 14 (+2) Wisdom: 16 (+3) Charisma: 16 (+3)
Background: Acrobat Alignment: Neutral Deity: Nethys (N)
Experience: 11352/12000 Level: 12 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 11/16
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Hefty Hauler: +2 Encumbered Bulk/+2 Maximum Bulk
Cat Fall: Suffers 10' less damage from falling
Features/Skills

Warpriest: Has the Deadly Simplicity feature
Warpriest: Has the Shield Block feature
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by Nethys
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +19 (wisdom; expert)

Assurance (Arcana): Can take an automatic 26 on Arcana checks
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Never flat-footed during Balance/Can use Acrobatics to Grab an Edge
Titan Wrestler: Can use Disarm, Grapple, Shove, and Trip on creatures up to 2 sizes larger
Combat
Hit Points: 128 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Battle Axe (+18 1d8+4 S; strength; trained); Morningstar (+20 1d6+4 B/P; strength; expert); Sap (+18 1d6+4 B; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +24
Deadly Simplicity: Staff inflicts +1 damage die step
Deity: Attack Trained (Staff)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Halberd as one category simpler
Warpriest: Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor)/Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)/Attack Expert (Staff; Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Proficiency (Sawtooth Saber): Attack Trained (Sawtooth Saber)
Replenishment Of War: Successful Strikes with a staff give self 6 temporary Hit Points, or 12 temporary Hit Points on a critical hit, for 1 rd
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Warpriest: Critical hits with a staff inflict its critical specialization effect
Save: Fortitude: +18 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +19 (dexterity; expert); Will: +21 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Warpriest: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 5; D1: 3; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 3 Attack: Divine: +19 (wisdom; expert) Spell DC: Divine: 29 (wisdom; expert)
Spells:
Abyssal Plague (D5 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts drained 1 and cannot recover for 1 day or until cured (save Fortitude inflicts 2 HP evil per spell level and -2 saves vs. Abyssal plague for 1 day; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts drained 2)
Agile Feet (D1 Tra): (1) Self gains +5 Speed and may ignore difficult terrain for the remainder of turn
Air Bubble (D1 Con): (R) R60' Target can breathe normally in any environment for 1 min
Air Walk (D4 Tra): (2) Touched can walk up to a 45-degree angle on air for 5 min
Alarm (D1 Abj): (10 min) 20' burst triggers choice of a mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying a specified password for 8 hr (heightened 3rd allows specifying characteristics for triggering creatures)
Anathematic Reprisal (D4 Enc): (R) R30' Target who has committed an anathema act suffers 4d6 HP mental and stupefied 1 for 1 rd (save basic Will; success negates stupefication) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Antimagic Field (D8 Abj): (3) 10' emanation disables spells and magic items while sustained for up to 1 min
Appearance Of Wealth (D1 Ill): (2) R30' 5' burst fascinates creatures attracted to wealth while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will effects last 1 rd; critical success negates)
Artistic Flourish (D4 Tra): (2) R15' Target weapon gains +1 attack, or target skill tool gains +1 checks, for 10 min (heightened 7th gives +2 bonus; 10th gives +2 bonus)
Athletic Rush (D1 Tra): (1) Self gains +10' Speed and +2 Athletics for 1 rd and may immediately Stride, Leap, Climb, or Swim
Augury (D2 Div): (10 min) Self may gain a general idea of whether the results of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future will be good or bad
Avatar (D10 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Huge creature with 30 temporary HP, Armor Class 37, +33 attack, +35 Athletics, and deity-specific features for 1 min
Bane (D1 Enc): (2) 5' emanation inflicts -1 attack on foes for 1 min (save Will negates); allows using a concentrate action each rd to increase the radius by 5'
Banishment (D5 Abj): (2) R30' Returns target to its home plane (save Will (-2 if cast using an additional action and a target anathema) negates; critical success inflicts stunned 1 on self; critical failure prevents target return for 1 week) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Bind Soul (D9 Nec): (2) R30' Traps the soul of a corpse dead less than 1 min in a gem until counteracted or the gem is destroyed
Bind Undead (D3 Nec): (2) R30' Controls the actions of a mindless undead of level less than or equal to the spell level for 1 day
Bit Of Luck (D1 Div): (2) R30' Willing target may use the better of two rolls on 1 save within 1 min once per target per day
Blade Barrier (D6 Evo): (3) R120' 20'x120'x2" wall inflicts 7d8 HP force for 1 min (save basic Reflex; critical failure prevents passage) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Bless (D1 Enc): (2) 5' radius gives allies +1 attack for 1 min; allows using a concentrate action each rd to increase the radius by 5'
Blind Ambition (D1 Enc): (2) R60' Target suffers -2 to resist attempts to Coerce it to advance its ambitions for 10 min (save Will inflicts -1 resistance; critical success negates; critical failure causes single-minded focus on its ambitions)
Blindness (D3 Nec): (2) R30' Blinds target for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent blindness)
Breath Of Life (D5 Nec): (R) R60' Prevents target death, restoring 4d8+3 HP
Calm Emotions (D2 Enc): (2) R120' 10' burst calms creatures and prevents them from taking hostile actions while sustained up to 1 min; hostile actions aimed at a creature end (save Will inflicts -1 attack; critical success negates; critical failure allows spell to continue after hostile actions)
Captivating Adoration (D4 Enc): (2) Fascinates targets in a 15' emanation for 1 min (save Will effects last 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure also improves attitude by 1 step) (heightened +1 extends emanation by 15')
Champion's Sacrifice (D6 Abj): (R) R30' Redirects damage from an ally to self
Charming Touch (D1 Enc): (1) Causes touched to become friendly, or helpful if already friendly and prevents hostile actions for 10 min (save Will negates; critical success target recognizes attempt; critical failure target becomes helpful)
Chill Touch (D0 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts 1d4+3 HP negative on a living creature (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) or flat-footed on an undead for 1 rd (save Fortitude negates; critical failure also inflicts fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP on living)
Chilling Darkness (D3 Evo): (2) R120' Ranged spell attack inflicts 5d6 HP cold, plus 5d6 HP evil on celestials (critical success inflicts double HP), and makes a counteract attempt vs. magical light (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP cold and evil)
Circle Of Protection (D3 Abj): (3) 10' emanation around touched gives +1 Armor Class and saves vs. creatures of specified alignment, and +3 vs. summoned creatures and on effects that control touched, for 1 min (heightened 4th effects last for 1 hr)
Cloak Of Shadow (D1 Evo): (1) 20' emanation around touched reduces bright light to dim and conceals touched for 1 min; touched may remove and move away from cloak
Command (D1 Enc): (2) R30' Target obeys a command to approach, run away, drop a held object, drop prone, or stand in place for 1 rd (save Will negates; critical failure causes target to use all actions on next turn to obey) (heightened 5th affects 10 targets)
Commanding Lash (D4 Enc): (1) R100' Target harmed by self's most recent action obeys a command to approach, run away, drop a held object, drop prone, or stand in place for 1 rd (save Will negates; critical failure target uses all actions on next turn to obey)
Competitive Edge (D4 Enc): (1) Self gains +1 attack and skill checks, or +3 immediately after a foe within 20' critically succeeds on the same, while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 7th gives +2 bonus or +4 after a foe critical success)
Comprehend Language (D2 Div): (2) R30' Target understands choice of heard language for 1 hr (heightened 3rd target may also speak the language; 4th affects 10 targets)
Continual Flame (D2 Evo): (3) Touched object emits a heatless flame until dismissed
Create Food (D2 Con): (1 hr) R30' Creates food for 6 Medium creatures that lasts for 1 day (heightened 4th creates food for 12; 6th creates food for 50; 8th creates food for 200)
Create Water (D1 Con): (2) Creates 2 gallons of water that lasts for 1 day
Crisis Of Faith (D3 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts 6d6 HP mental, or 6d8 HP mental and stupefied 1 for 1 rd on divine casters (save Will inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, stupefied 1 for 1 rd, and no divine casting for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP, or +2d8 HP on divine casters)
Crusade (D9 Enc): (2) R60' 4 targets dedicate actions to a specified cause for 10 min; ends if an ally attacks a target or for a level 14 target reduced to half HP (save Will for level 15 each rd ends) (heightened 10th ends for a level 16 target reduced to half HP or a level 17 target who saves)
Cry Of Destruction (D1 Evo): (2) 15' cone inflicts 1d8 HP sonic, or 1d12 if self has already inflicted damage this turn (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP or +1d12 HP)
Darkened Eyes (D4 Tra): (2) R60' Suppresses target's darkvision or low-light vision for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure also blinds target until a successful save)
Darkness (D2 Evo): (2) R120' 20' burst counteracts natural light and magical light of equal or lesser level (heightened 4th causes creatures with darkvision to treat targets within darkness as concealed)
Darkvision (D2 Div): (2) Self can see in darkness for 1 hr (heightened 3rd affects touched target; 5th lasts until next daily prep)
Daze (D0 Enc): (2) R60' Target suffers 3 HP mental (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts double HP plus stunned 1) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Dazzling Flash (D1 Evo): (2) 15' cone inflicts blinded for 1 rd (Interact action ends) and dazzled for 1 min (save Fortitude dazzled for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts dazzled for 1 hr) (heightened 3rd 30' cone)
Deafness (D2 Nec): (2) R30' Deafens target for 10 min (save Fortitude effects last 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent deafness)
Death Knell (D2 Nec): (2) Kills touched target with 0 HP and gives self 10 temporary HP and +1 attack and damage for 10 min (save Will increases target's dying value by 1; critical success negates)
Death Ward (D5 Abj): (2) Touched gains +4 saves vs. death and negative effects, negative resistance 10, and suppressed doomed effects for 10 min
Death's Call (D1 Nec): (R) R20' Gives self temporary HP for 1 min equal to the level of a living creature that dies or double the level of an undead creature that is destroyed
Delusional Pride (D4 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts -1 attacks and skill checks on a target that fails an attack or skill check by the end of its turn (-2 if it fails twice) for 10 min (save Will effects last 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects last 24 hr)
Destructive Aura (D4 Evo): (2) 15' emanation inflicts -2 resistances (heightened +2 inflicts an additional -2 resistances)
Detect Alignment (D1 Div): (2) 30' emanation allows the self to detect auras of specified alignment (heightened 2nd reveals each aura's location and strength)
Detect Magic (D0 Div): (2) 30' emanation allows the self to discern the presence of magic and detect illusions of up to the spell level (heightened 3rd reveals school of highest-level effect; 4th reveals source of highest-level effect)
Detect Poison (D1 Div): (2) R30' Reveals whether the target creature or object is venomous or poisoned (heightened 2nd reveals the number and types of poison)
Dimensional Anchor (D4 Abj): (2) R30' Makes a counteract attempt vs. any effect that would move target to a different plane for 10 min (save Will effects last 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure effects last 1 hr)
Dimensional Lock (D7 Abj): (2) R120' 60' burst allows counteract attempts vs. any teleportation or planar travel until next daily prep
Discern Lies (D4 Div): (2) Self gains +4 Perception vs. lies for 10 min
Discern Location (D8 Div): (10 min) Self knows the exact location of a specified familiar creature or object for 10 min
Dispel Magic (D2 Abj): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to remove 1 spell effect from the target or to make a magic item inert for 10 min
Disperse Into Air (D4 Tra): (R) After taking damage, self becomes air with no actions and immunity to attacks until the end of turn, then reforms anywhere within 15'
Disrupt Undead (D0 Nec): (2) R30' Inflicts 1d6+3 HP positive and enfeebled 1 for 1 rd on target undead (save Fortitude inflicts HP only) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Disrupting Weapons (D1 Nec): (2) Two touched weapons inflict +1d4 HP positive vs. undead for 1 min (heightened 3rd weapons inflict +2d4 HP; 5th three weapons inflict +3d4 HP)
Divine Aura (D8 Abj): (2) 10' emanation (+10' after first sustain) gives allies +1 Armor Class and saves, +2 vs. creatures opposed to specified alignment, and +4 vs. opposed alignment control, and blinds melee attackers of opposed alignment (save Will negates), while sustained for up to 1 min
Divine Decree (D7 Evo): (2) R40' 40' emanation inflicts 7d10 HP specified alignment damage (save Fortitude inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, enfeebled 2 for 1 min, banishment, and, for level 10 and lower, paralysis for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts death); matching alignment negates; unopposed alignment inflicts half HP)
Divine Inspiration (D8 Enc): (2) Willing touched recovers 1 6th-level or lower spell or slot or regains Focus Points
Divine Lance (D0 Evo): (2) R30' Ranged attack inflicts 1d4+3 HP of chosen alignment (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Divine Vessel (D7 Tra): (2) Self becomes Large and gains 40 temporary HP, 25' fly Speed, +1 vs. spells, darkvision, +1 HP of chosen alignment on unarmed attacks, and fist, bite, or claw attacks that inflict 2d8 HP, 2d10 HP, or 2d10 HP, and suffers weakness 10 to the opposite alignment for 1 min (heightened 9th gives 60 temporary HP and weakness 15, lasting 10 min)
Divine Wrath (D4 Evo): (2) R120' 20' burst inflicts 4d10 HP chosen alignment damage and sickened 1 (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2 and slowed 1; creatures with matching alignment are unaffected and neutral creatures improve save by 1 step) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Downpour (D4 Evo): (2) R120' 30' burst extinguishes non-magical flames and gives concealment and fire resistance 10 for 1 min (heightened +1 gives +2 fire resistance)
Dream Message (D3 Enc): (10 min) Self sends 1 min of speech to a familiar creature (heightened 4th sends speech to 10 familiar creatures)
Dreamer's Call (D4 Enc): (2) R30' Target obeys a suggestion and suffers flat-footed and fascinated until the end of its next turn (save Will flat-footed and fascinated only; critical success negates; critical failure target takes no other actions)
Drop Dead (D5 Ill): (R) R120' Upon receiving a wound, the target becomes invisible and is replaced by an illusionary corpse while sustained for up to 1 min; a hostile act by the target ends (heightened 7th a hostile act does not end)
Eclipse Burst (D7 Nec): (2) R500' 60' burst blocks magical light and inflicts 8d10 HP cold, plus 8d4 HP negative to living creatures (save basic Reflex; critical failure also inflicts permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP cold and +1d4 HP negative)
Endure Elements (D2 Abj): (10 min) Protects touched from choice of severe cold or heat until next daily prep (heightened 3rd protects from both cold and heat; 5th protects from extreme cold and heat)
Enduring Might (D4 Abj): (R) Upon taking damage, self gains resistance 12 to that damage (heightened +1 gives +2 resistance)
Energy Aegis (D7 Abj): (1 min) Touched gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, negative, positive, and sonic damage for 1 min (heightened 9th gives resistance 10)
Enhance Victuals (D2 Tra): (1 min) Removes poison and improves quality of touched 1 gallon of water or 5 pounds of food for 1 hr (heightened +1 affects +1 gallon or +5 pounds
Eradicate Undeath (D4 Nec): (2) 30' cone inflicts 4d12 HP positive to undead (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Ethereal Jaunt (D7 Con): (2) Self moves to the Ethereal Plane while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 9th R30' affects up to 5 additional willing creatures and lasts 10 min)
Face In The Crowd (D1 Ill): (1) Self gains +2 Deception and Stealth to blend into a crowd and ignores difficult terrain from crowds for 1 min (heightened 3rd R10' affects 10 creatures)
Faerie Fire (D2 Evo): (2) R120' 10' burst makes concealed creatures visible and invisible creatures concealed for 5 min
Fear (D1 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3, and the target flees for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Field Of Life (D6 Nec): (2) R30' 20' burst restores 1d8 HP per rd to living and inflicts 1d8 HP positive per rd to undead while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 8th inflicts 1d10 HP; 9th inflicts 1d12 HP)
Finger Of Death (D7 Nec): (2) R30' Target suffers 70 HP negative, dying at 0 HP (heightened +1 inflicts +10 HP)
Fire Ray (D1 Evo): (2) R60' Spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP fire; critical success inflicts double HP and 1d4 HP persistent fire (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP initial and +1d4 HP persistent)
Flame Barrier (D4 Abj): (R) R60' Target gains fire resistance 15 against triggering effect (heightened +2 gives +5 resistance)
Flame Strike (D5 Evo): (2) R120' 10' radius inflicts 8d6 HP fire, reducing any resistance by half (save Reflex inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP; creatures immune to fire improve save by 1 degree) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Forbidding Ward (D0 Abj): (2) R30' Target gains +1 Armor Class and saves vs. specified foe while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 bonus)
Forced Quiet (D1 Abj): (2) R30' Target can speak only at a whisper, requiring others 10'+ away to succeed on a DC 29 Perception to hear, for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects last 10 min)
Foresight (D9 Div): (2) Touched gains +2 initiative and negates flat-footed vs. undetected and flanking creatures, and self may use a Reaction to give the target the better of two rolls in response to danger, for 1 hr
Freedom Of Movement (D4 Abj): (2) Relieves touched of Speed penalty effects and gives automatic success on Escape attempts for 10 min
Gate (D10 Con): (2) R120' Opens a 40' radius gate to another plane while sustained for up to 1 min
Gentle Repose (D2 Nec): (2) Touched corpse resists decay and cannot be made undead until next daily prep (heightened 5th effects are permanent)
Ghoulish Cravings (D2 Nec): (2) Touched suffers 3d8 HP negative and regains half HP for 1 day (save Fortitude negates; critical failure inflicts 3d8 HP negative and regains no HP for 1 day)
Glimpse The Truth (D4 Div): (1) 30' emanation gives counteract attempts to allow self to see through illusions for 1 rd (heightened 7th self may reveal illusions to others)
Globe Of Invulnerability (D4 Abj): (2) 10' burst inflicts Dispel Magic effects for 10 min
Glyph Of Warding (D3 Abj): (10 min) Target container or 10'x10' area triggers a chosen spell of lower level in response to a specified trigger
Guidance (D1 Div): (2) R30' Target gains +1 on choice of attack, Perception, save, or skill check before the start of the self's next turn; cannot be repeated on the same target for 1 hr
Harm (D1 Nec): (1) (1) Touched suffers 1d8 HP negative, (2) R30' target suffers 1d8 HP negative, or (3) 30' emanation inflicts 1d8 HP negative; undead regain 1d8 HP, +8 HP for (2) (heightened +1 inflicts or restores +1d8 HP and +8 HP for (2))
Heal (D1 Nec): (1) (1) Touched regains 1d8 HP, (2) R30' target regains 1d8+8 HP, or (3) 30' emanation restores 1d8 HP; undead suffer 1d8 HP positive (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 restores or inflicts +1d8 HP and +8 HP for (2))
Healer's Blessing (D1 Nec): (1) R30' Target gains +2 HP from healing spells for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +1 HP)
Hero's Defiance (D10 Nec): (F) Self recovers 10d4+20 HP
Heroism (D3 Enc): (2) Touched gains +1 attack, Perception, saves, and skill checks for 10 min (heightened 6th gives +2 bonus; 8th gives +3 bonus)
Holy Cascade (D4 Evo): (2) R500' 20' burst inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning, plus 6d6 HP positive to undead and 6d6 HP good to fiends (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP bludgeoning and +2d6 HP positive and good)
Hurtling Stone (D1 Evo): (1) R60' Spell attack inflicts 1d6+4 HP bludgeoning, critical success inflicts double HP (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Know Direction (D0 Div): (2) Tells the self which direction is north (heightened 7th gives direction to a familiar location)
Know The Enemy (D4 Div): (R) During initiative, allows the self to take the better of two rolls on an immediate Recall Knowledge to remember a visible creature's abilities
Lay On Hands (D1 Nec): (1) Touched living regains 6 HP and gains +2 Armor Class for 1 rd; undead suffers 1d6 HP and -2 Armor Class for 1 rd (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 restores +6 HP or inflicts +1d6 HP)
Light (D0 Evo): (2) Touched object lights a 20' radius until next daily prep (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Litany Against Sloth (D5 Evo): (2) R30' Evil target suffers Reaction prevention and slowed 1 for 1 rd (save Will Reaction prevention only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 2)
Litany Against Wrath (D3 Evo): (1) R30' Evil target suffers 3d6 HP good whenever it damages a good creature for 1 rd (save Will first time damaging a good creature only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 2)
Litany Of Righteousness (D7 Evo): (1) R30' Evil target suffers weakness 7 to good for 1 rd (heightened +1 inflicts weakness +1)
Localized Quake (D4 Tra): (2) Choice of 15' emanation or cone inflicts 4d6 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP)
Locate (D3 Div): (10 min) R500' Reveals direction to a named object or the nearest object of a named type while sustained (heightened 5th reveals direction to a creature or ancestry)
Lock (D1 Abj): (2) Touched latch or lock opens only for self until next daily prep; a successful DC 29 Athletics or Thievery check (or +4 lock DC if higher) ends the spell (heightened 2nd effects are permanent)
Lucky Break (D4 Div): (R) Self rerolls a failed save once per 10 min
Magic Weapon (D1 Tra): (2) Touched weapon gains +1 attack and a second damage die for 1 min
Magic's Vessel (D1 Enc): (1) Touched gains +1 saves; subsequent casting sustains the spell up to 1 min and gives the target resistance to spell damage equal to the cast spell's level
Malignant Sustenance (D4 Nec): (2) Touched undead gains fast healing 7 for 1 min (heightened +1 gives +2 fast healing)
Massacre (D9 Nec): (2) 60' line inflicts 100 HP negative on creatures up to level 17 and kills those reduced to 0 HP; if none die, it inflicts an additional 30 negative on all within line (save Fortitude inflicts 9d6 HP; critical success negates; critical failure kills) (heightened 10th inflicts 115 HP (save 10d6 HP) on creatures up to level 19)
Mending (D1 Tra): (10 min) Restores 5 HP per spell level to a light, non-magical object (heightened 2nd may affect a 1 Bulk object; 3rd may affect a 2 Bulk or magical 1 Bulk object)
Message (D0 Ill): (1) R120' Self can hold a private conversation with a visible target for 1 turn (heightened 3rd R500')
Miracle (D10 Div): (3) Duplicates the effects of a known spell of up to 9th level or of a common spell of up to 7th level
Moment Of Renewal (D8 Nec): (2) 6 touched instantly gain the effects of 24 hr of rest
Moonbeam (D1 Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts dazzled for 1 rd and 1d6 HP fire that counts as silver; critical success inflicts dazzled for 1 min and double HP (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Mystic Beacon (D4 Evo): (1) R30' Gives the next damage or healing spell cast by target within 1 rd heightened +1 effects
Nature's Bounty (D4 Con): (1) Creates a fruit or vegetable that restores 3d10+12 HP if eaten within 1 min (heightened +1 restores +6 HP)
Neutralize Poison (D3 Nec): (2) Makes a counteract check against 1 poison affecting touched
Outcast's Curse (D4 Enc): (2) Touched suffers one step worse initial attitudes and the worse of two Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance rolls until removed (save Will effects last 10 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts initial attitudes two steps worse)
Overstuff (D1 Tra): (2) R30' Target suffers sickened 1 and -10' Speed until no longer sickened (save Fortitude target may use an action to end sickened condition; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2)
Overwhelming Presence (D9 Enc): (2) 40' burst inflicts fascinated and forces creatures to pay tribute once per turn for six turns (save Will affected must pay tribute only twice; critical success negates; critical failure causes affected to use all actions each turn to pay tribute)
Perfected Form (D4 Abj): (R) Self rerolls a failed save vs. a morph, petrification, or polymorph effect and uses the better result
Perfected Mind (D1 Abj): (1) Gives the self a second Will save vs. a mental effect once per effect
Plane Shift (D7 Con): (10 min) Transports self and 8 willing targets to a different plane
Positive Luminance (D4 Nec): (1) 10' radius light inflicts 2 HP positive to successful undead attackers for 1 min; self may increase radius by 10' and damage by 2 HP each rd and may end the spell early to heal a living creature or damage an undead creature by double HP (heightened +1 inflicts +0.5 HP)
Precious Metals (D4 Tra): (1) Transforms touched metal item into choice of cold iron, copper, gold, iron, silver, or steel for 1 min (heightened 8th may transform into adamantine or mithral)
Prestidigitation (D0 Evo): (2) R10' Performs choice of cooking, lifting, making a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Protection (D1 Abj): (2) Touched gains +1 Armor Class and saves vs. creatures of specified alignment, and +3 vs. summoned creatures and on control effects, for 1 min
Protector's Sacrifice (D1 Abj): (R) R30' Transfers 3 HP damage from an attack from target to self (heightened +1 transfers +3 HP)
Protector's Sphere (D4 Abj): (2) 15' emanation gives resistance 3 to all damage to self and allies (heightened +1 gives +1 resistance)
Prying Eye (D5 Div): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows the self to see from the target location and that can be moved 30' each rd while sustained
Pulse Of The City (D4 Div): (3) R25 miles; reveals information about the nearest settlement within range (heightened 5th increases range to 100 miles)
Purify Food And Drink (D1 Nec): (2) Removes contaminates from 1 cubic foot of food or water
Pushing Gust (D1 Con): (2) R500' Moves target away from self 10' (save Fortitude moves target 5'; critical success negates; critical failure moves target 10' and knocks prone)
Raise Dead (D6 Nec): (10 min) R10' Restores soul to a willing creature up to level 13 dead for at most 3 days, giving target 1 HP, clumsy 2, drained 2, and enfeebled 2 for 1 week (heightened +2 level +2)
Ray Of Enfeeblement (D1 Nec): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts enfeebled 2 for 1 min (critical success increases by 1 step) (save Fortitude inflicts enfeebled 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3)
Read Aura (D0 Div): (1 min) R30' Self detects whether an object is magical and the related school of magic (heightened 3rd allows detection on 10 objects; 6th allows detection on unlimited objects)
Read Fate (D1 Div): (1 min) R10' Successful DC 6 flat check gives a one-word clue to target's short-term fate
Read Omens (D4 Div): (10 min) Self receives a clue or advice about a proposed activity up to 1 week in the future
Rebuke Death (D4 Nec): (1) 20' emanation restores 3d6 HP to 1 target (2/3 targets for 2/3 actions) and recovers from dying condition without suffering wounded condition (heightened +1 restores +1d6 HP)
Regenerate (D7 Nec): (2) Touched target regains 15 HP and regrows a damaged organ each rd for 1 min; suffering new acid or fire damage deactivates effects for 1 rd (heightened 9th restores 20 HP each rd)
Remake (D10 Con): (1 hr) Fully re-creates a known object up to 5' cu
Remove Curse (D4 Nec): (10 min) Makes a counteract attempt vs. one curse affecting touched
Remove Disease (D3 Nec): (10 min) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 disease affecting touched
Remove Fear (D2 Enc): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 fear effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Remove Paralysis (D2 Nec): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 paralysis effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Repulsion (D6 Abj): (2) Up to 40' emanation prevents creatures from approaching (save Will inflicts difficult terrain; critical success negates)
Resist Energy (D2 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 vs. chosen energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
Restoration (D2 Nec): (1 min) Gives choice of a 2-step reduction to a clumsy, enfeebled, or stupefied condition, a 1-step reduction to two of these conditions, or a 1-stage reduction to a toxin affecting touched (heightened 4th allows reducing a drained condition, lessening a toxin by 2 stages, or reducing a non-permanent doomed condition by 1; 6th allows reducing a permanent doomed condition)
Restore Senses (D2 Nec): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a magical blindness or deafness effect affecting touched
Retributive Pain (D4 Abj): (R) R30' Target that damages the self suffers half as many HP mental
Revival (D10 Nec): (2) 30' radius restores 10d8+40 HP and raises dead with the same number of temporary HP while sustained for up to 1 min
Righteous Might (D6 Tra): (2) Self gains Armor Class 32, 10 temporary HP, resistance 3 to physical damage, darkvision, +21 attack and +8 damage (or +6 ranged) with a staff, and +23 Athletics for 1 min (heightened 8th gives Large form, 10' reach, Armor Class 33, 15 temporary HP, resistance 4 to physical damage, +28 attack, +15 damage (or +12 ranged) with a staff, and +29 Athletics)
Safeguard Secret (D4 Abj): (1 min) 10' Self and allies gain +4 skill checks to conceal a specified piece of knowledge for 1 hr
Sanctified Ground (D3 Abj): (1 min) 30' burst gives +1 Armor Class, attack, damage, and saves vs. choice of aberrations, celestials, dragons, fiends, monitors, or undead until next daily prep
Sanctuary (D1 Abj): (2) Prevents creatures from attacking touched for 1 min (save Will each rd negates for 1 rd; critical success ends spell; critical failure allows no further save attempts)
Savor The Sting (D1 Enc): (1) Touch inflicts 1d4 HP mental and 1d4 HP persistent mental and gives self +1 attack and skill checks vs. target (save Will inflicts half initial HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP initial and persistent)
Scholarly Recollection (D1 Div): (R) Self rerolls a Seek or Recall Knowledge check and uses the better result
Searing Light (D3 Evo): (2) R120' Ranged spell attack inflicts 5d6 HP fire, plus 5d6 HP good to fiends and undead (critical success inflicts double HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
See Invisibility (D2 Div): (2) Self treats invisible creatures and objects as concealed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last 8 hr)
Sending (D5 Div): (3) Self sends a 25-word message to a known creature
Shadow Blast (D5 Evo): (2) Choice of 30' cone, R120' 15' burst, or 50' line inflicts 5d8 HP of choice of damage type (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Shared Nightmare (D4 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts confused for 1 action each rd for 1 min (save Will inflicts confused on self for 1 action next turn; critical success inflicts confused on self for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts confused for 1 min)
Shield (D0 Abj): (1) Self gains +1 Armor Class and may use Shield Block with Hardness 5 until next turn (heightened +2 gives +5 Hardness)
Shield Other (D2 Nec): (2) R30' Transfers half of damage suffered by target to self for 10 min or until either is reduced to 0 HP
Sigil (D0 Tra): (2) Inscribes a 1" sq magical mark on the touched object or creature for 1 week or until scrubbed off (heightened 3rd effects last 1 month; 5th effects last 1 year; 7th effects are permanent)
Silence (D2 Ill): (2) Touched target makes no sound for 1 min (heightened 4th affects a 10' radius around target)
Soothing Words (D1 Enc): (1) R30' Gives +1 Will and +2 vs. emotion effects for 1 rd; also counteracts an existing emotion effect (heightened 5th gives +2 Will and +3 vs. emotion effects)
Sound Burst (D2 Evo): (2) R30' 10' burst inflicts 2d10 HP sonic (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts deafened for 1 min and stunned 1) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Spell Immunity (D4 Abj): (2) Gives touched an automatic counteract attempt vs. a specified spell until next daily prep
Spellwrack (D6 Abj): (2) R30' Each time the target is affected by a spell with a duration, it suffers 2d12 HP persistent force and the duration of all spells affecting it is reduced by 1 rd (save Will effects last 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts 4d12 HP)
Spirit Blast (D6 Nec): (2) R30' Target's spirit suffers 16d6 HP force (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Spirit Link (D1 Nec): (2) R30' Transfers 2 HP of damage each rd from the willing target to the self for 10 min (heightened +1 transfers +2 HP)
Spiritual Epidemic (D8 Nec): (2) R120' Inflicts enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 for 1 min and enfeebled 1 and stupefied 1 permanently; also affects creatures casting divine or occult spells on target (save Will inflicts enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 for 1 rd only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3 and stupefied 3 for 1 min and enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 permanently)
Spiritual Guardian (D5 Abj): (2) R120' Summoned guardian with 50 HP absorbs 10 HP of damage, or attacks to inflict 2d8 HP force, each rd while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 guardian gains +20 HP and inflicts +1d8 HP)
Spiritual Weapon (D2 Evo): (2) R120' Spectral weapon attacks once each rd, inflicting 1d8 HP force or weapon damage type, while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Splash Of Art (D1 Ill): (2) R30' 5' burst inflicts one of dazzled for 1 rd, enfeebled 1 for 1 rd, frightened 1, or clumsy 1 for 1 rd, randomly chosen (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts dazzled for 1 min, enfeebled 2 for 1 rd, frightened 2, or clumsy 2 for 1 rd)
Stabilize (D0 Nec): (2) R30' Removes dying condition from target
Status (D2 Div): (2) Self knows touched's direction, distance, and conditions until next daily prep (heightened 4th R10' affects 10 targets)
Stone Tell (D6 Evo): (2) Self can converse with stone for 10 min
Stone To Flesh (D6 Tra): (2) Restores touched petrified creature or transforms a human-sized stone object into flesh
Sudden Shift (D1 Abj): (R) Self Steps and becomes concealed until the end of next turn
Summon Celestial (D5 Con): (3) R30' A level 5 celestial appears and fights for the self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Fiend (D5 Con): (3) R30' A level 5 fiend appears and fights for the self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Sunburst (D7 Evo): (2) R500' 60' burst inflicts 8d10 HP fire plus 8d10 HP positive to undead (save Reflex inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP fire and positive)
Sweet Dream (D1 Enc): (3) R30' Willing target who sleeps for 1 min gains choice of +1 intelligence- or charisma-based skill checks or +5' Speed for remainder of 10 min
Take Its Course (D4 Nec): (2) Touched gains an immediate save vs. an affliction, with a +2 or -2 modifier, or an immediate DC 5 or 20 flat check against poison damage (save Will negates) (heightened 7th may affect multiple afflictions and poisons)
Talking Corpse (D4 Nec): (10 min) Self gains truthful answers from a touched corpse (save Will allows target to lie or refuse to answer; critical success prevents self from resting for 24 hr; critical failure inflicts -2 on Deception checks)
Telepathic Demand (D9 Enc): (3) Self can exchange 25-word messages with an existing telepathic target, sending a Suggestion as part of the message (save Will gives immunity for 1 day; critical success gives immunity for 1 month)
Tempt Fate (D4 Div): (R) R120' Target gains +1 on triggering save, making it either a critical success or critical failure
Tidal Surge (D1 Evo): (1) R60' Moves target 5' on ground or 10' in water (save Fortitude negates; critical failure doubles distance)
Tongues (D5 Div): (2) Target understands and speaks all languages for 1 hr (heightened 7th lasts for 8 hr)
Touch Of Obedience (D1 Enc): (1) Touch inflicts stupefied 1 until the end of next turn (save Will inflicts stupefied 1 until the end of current turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stupefied 1 for 1 min)
Touch Of The Moon (D4 Enc): (1) Target emits dim light and may gain +1 attack and +4 damage, +1 attack, +1 Armor Class, +1 saves, and +4 damage, or +1 Armor Class and saves, depending on the current moon phase, for 1 min
Touch Of Undeath (D1 Nec): (1) Touch inflicts 1d6 HP negative and half healing for 1 rd (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical success inflicts double HP and half healing for 1 min) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Traveler's Transit (D4 Evo): (2) Self gains choice of climb or swim Speed equal to Speed for 1 min (heightened 5th self may choose to gain fly speed)
Trickster's Twin (D4 Ill): (2) R30' Target believes that self is in a location up to 100' distant for 1 min or until succeeding at a Will save in response to interacting with the illusion or to the illusion performing a nonsensical or hostile action (save Will no subsequent Will save is necessary; critical success negates; critical failure requires critical success on a Will save to end spell)
True Seeing (D6 Div): (2) R60' Self sees through illusions and transmutations for 10 min
Undetectable Alignment (D2 Abj): (1 min) Touched appears neutral to alignment detection until next daily prep
Unimpeded Stride (D1 Tra): (1) Self escapes from magical holds of level less than or equal to spell, then may Stride, ignoring Speed penalties
Unity (D4 Abj): (R) R30' Allies may use self's saving throw vs. triggering spell or ability
Vampiric Exsanguination (D6 Nec): (2) 30' cone inflicts 12d6 HP negative, giving the self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half that inflicted on the most-affected target (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Vampiric Touch (D3 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts 6d6 HP negative, giving the self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half the inflicted damage (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Veil Of Confidence (D1 Enc): (1) Reduces any frightened condition on self by 1 for 1 min; critical failure ends spell and increases frightened condition by 1
Ventriloquism (D1 Ill): (2) Self project their voice up to 60' for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects last 1 hr and allow changing voice quality; requires an active Perception to attempt to disbelieve)
Vibrant Thorns (D1 Tra): (1) Unarmed and adjacent melee attacks on self inflict 1 HP piercing on attacker for 1 min; casting a positive spell increases damage to 1d6 for 1 turn (heightened +1 inflicts +1 HP, +1d6 HP after positive casting)
Vital Beacon (D4 Nec): (1 min) Touch heals once each rd for 4 rd: 4d10 HP, 4d8 HP, 4d6 HP, then 4d4 HP (heightened +1 restores +1 die each rd)
Wail Of The Banshee (D9 Nec): (2) 40' emanation inflicts 8d10 HP negative and drained 1d4 (save Fortitude inflicts HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and drained 4)
Waking Nightmare (D1 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3; failure while sleeping also inflicts fleeing for 1 rd)
Wanderer's Guide (D3 Div): (1 min) Reveals a route to a specified destination and reduces the movement penalty from difficult terrain by half until next daily prep
Water Breathing (D2 Tra): (1 min) R30' 5 targets may breathe water for 1 hr (heightened 3rd effects last 8 hr; 4th effects last until next daily prep)
Water Walk (D2 Tra): (2) Touched may walk on liquids for 10 min (heightened 4th R30' affects 10 creatures, and effects last 1 hr)
Weapon Of Judgment (D9 Evo): (2) +19 attacks by force weapon inflict 3d10+3 HP of choice of damage type for 1 min (heightened 10th inflicts +1d10 HP)
Weapon Surge (D1 Evo): (1) Held weapon gains +1 attack and an additional die of damage on next attach before the start of next turn
Word Of Freedom (D4 Enc): (1) R30' Suppresses choice of a confused, frightened, grabbed, paralyzed, or restrained condition affecting target for 1 rd
Word Of Truth (D1 Div): (1) Speaking a true statement causes a glowing deity symbol to appear above self's head while sustained for up to 1 min
Zeal For Battle (D4 Enc): (R) R10' Self and 1 ally both use the higher of their two initiative rolls
Zealous Conviction (D6 Enc): (2) R30' 10 targets gain 12 temporary HP, gain +2 Will vs. mental effects, and must comply with the self's requests for 10 min (save Will after fulfilling a repugnant request ends spell) (heightened +1 gives 18 temporary HP and +3 Will)
Zone Of Truth (D3 Enc): (2) R30' 20' burst prevents lies and inflicts -2 Deception for 10 min (save Will inflicts -2 Deception only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts -4 Deception)
Magic Notes:
Warpriest: Spell Expert (Divine)
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare two additional cantrips each day or add two additional cantrips to repertoire
Deity: Has access to Magic Missile, Magic Mouth, Levitate, Blink, Prying Eye, Wall Of Force, Warp Mind, Maze, and Destruction spells
Divine Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Divine Weapon: (F) Using a divine spell slot causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d4 HP force or +1d6 HP alignment for the remainder of the turn once per turn
Harmful Font: Can cast Harm at level 6 an additional 4 times per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Sap Life: Casting Harm on another creature restores Hit Points to self equal to the spell level
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
